text: ye vahee log hai jinaka kahana hai ki "allaah ne hamen taakeed kee hai ki ham kisee rasool par eemaan na laen, jabatak ki vah hamaare saamane aisee qurabaanee na pesh kare jise aag kha jae." kaho, "tumhaare paas mujhase pahale kitane hee rasool khulee nishaaniyaan lekar aa chuke hai, aur ve vah cheez bhee lae the jisake lie tum kah rahe ho. phir yadi tum sachche ho to tumane unhen qatl kyon kiya
